A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Zero stars if I could... So long and empty. The casino arc was so bad it was unintentionally the funniest part of this shit show. Hated the fuck out of this Sci-Fi channel version of star wars. Utter bullshit. At least the director had Girl-Luke save the Jedi Tomes at the end. Hated the dumpy little Asian chick. Useless. \n\nAbrams is back for the final installment\, hopefully he can rework his TFA magi and fix this abortion of a film.
